description: This file contains unit tests for classes and methods related to DataElement and LinkedDataElement in the WPEFramework Core namespace. The tests verify behaviors such as copying, resizing, CRC calculation, searching, and linked data management.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: Represents a data element with methods for copying, CRC calculation, searching, and manipulating bits.

classes.name: LinkedDataElement
classes.description: Manages linked data elements, supporting nested or linked buffer structures.

classes.name: DataElementParser
classes.description: Provides parsing functionalities for DataElement instances.

methods.name: Copy
methods.description: Copies data from a buffer or another DataElement into the object.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Gets or sets the size of the DataElement.

methods.name: CRC32
methods.description: Calculates the CRC32 checksum over a specified range.

methods.name: SearchNumber
methods.description: Searches for a number in the data buffer with specified endianness.

methods.name: SetNumber
methods.description: Sets a numeric value at a specified position in the data buffer.

methods.name: GetNumber
methods.description: Retrieves a numeric value from the data buffer.

methods.name: Search
methods.description: Searches for a sequence of bytes within the data buffer.

methods.name: SetBitNumber
methods.description: Sets bits within a number at a specific position.

methods.name: GetBitNumber
methods.description: Retrieves bits from a number at a specific position.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets a value at a specific offset in the data buffer.

methods.name: Align
methods.description: Aligns the DataElement according to its type.

methods.name: Enclosed
methods.description: Manages linked or enclosed data elements.

methods.name: GetBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves data from the buffer.

methods.name: SetBuffer
methods.description: Sets data in the buffer.

methods.name: Enclosed
methods.description: Marks the DataElement as enclosed within another.

methods.name: LinkedSize
methods.description: Returns the total size of linked data.

methods.name: LinkedElements
methods.description: Returns the number of linked data elements.

methods.name: TEST(test_data,simple_data)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: TEST(test_dataParser,simple_dataParser)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: TEST(test_linkeddata,simple_linkeddata)
methods.description: unavailable
